wordGroup: livestock breeding 畜牧业，畜牧饲养；家畜繁育
livestock farming 畜牧业；养畜业
livestock farm 畜牧场；禽畜饲养场；牧场

sentences.en: The heavy rains and flooding killed scores of livestock.
sentences.cn: 大雨和洪水淹死了许多家畜。

sentences.en: The robots are not limited to herding and monitoring livestock.
sentences.cn: 这些机器人不仅仅能用于放牧和监控牲畜。

sentences.en: A livestock vaccine against the disease exists but is rarely used.
sentences.cn: 有一种家畜疫苗可以预防这种疾病，但它很少被使用。
